title: Missed out on Prime Day? Last Chance to use code for extra savings on Tykr through July 14
content:
Macworld

The stock market can be an intimidating place, especially for beginners. Want to be a better investor? Then the Tykr Stock Screener is a resource you’ll definitely want to have — And since you can save $20 off the regular price with code during Deal Days, it makes sense to get it now.

Tykr is a market education and stock analysis tool that identifies the risk factor for 30,000 US and international stocks. It illustrates the basics of making a trade, teaches you how to identify good deals, and it makes calculations openly so you’ll see exactly how it works.

If you’re new to investing, then it’s something that’s worth having in your corner. And since it presents information in a beginner-friendly way, virtually anyone can make sense of it — Which is probably why it’s earned 4.9 out of 5-star ratings by users on both Trustpilot and AppSumo.

And now is a great time to get it. That’s because Deal Days, which is kind of like our version of Prime Day. Simply enter the code STOCK at check out prior to the sale’s end and you’ll save an additional $20 off our already discounted price.

Looking for more deals? Check out this offer to get 10TB of secure lifetime cloud backups for only $80.

Save $20 off a lifetime subscription to the Tykr Stock Screener Pro Plan — normally $119.99 — with code “STOCK” until 11:59 pm on July 14.

 

Tykr Stock Screener: Pro Plan Lifetime Subscription – $119.99

See Deal

Prices subject to change.
